::Ramulus/Grimmler/Slayer::

Grimmler frowns. "Size of factions doesn't have as much significance 
as you might think, Valtron," he says, looking around at the Preds, 
"Its the strategy that counts. If they get a good surprize attack in, 
or have information on how to bypass defences or something, even a
big 
faction would have trouble."

Ramulus watches the two, keeping an eye on the Predacons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer growls as Lunarpine slashes his jetpack more, firing once
again 
at the Maximal.

"My name .... is Slayer!" he yells at Lunarpine's comment, a metal 
place sliding out of his back to cover some of the jetpack damage,
the 
flying device managing to take them into the air again. Slayer aims 
his shoulder blasters at Lunarpine, "And you shall soon see why.."

He fires, multiple times.
